SEARCH
Module org.calcmvc
Package org.calcmvc.common.misc

Class MyConcreteObservable

java.lang.Object
org.calcmvc.common.misc.MyConcreteObservable
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Calc, CalcCommonBase, CommonBase
public abstract class MyConcreteObservable extends Object implements MyObservable
This class handles the [PropertyChangeListener] observable. Each concrete class extending this one will be able to send property-based notifications to their observers.
Author:
x. skapin
